data.summary:
As a Cloud Consultant at Astir IT Solutions with many years of experience, I specialize in end-to-end observability architecture and performance optimization. I have hands-on expertise in designing and implementing monitoring solutions using tools such as Dynatrace, Splunk, and Elastic Stack (ELK) for logs, metrics, and distributed tracing. My work focuses on leveraging Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform to automate provisioning and configuration across leading cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure.
My role emphasizes enabling efficient CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and GitHub Workflows, streamlining deployment processes. I am committed to helping organizations enhance their cloud-native environments with scalable, secure, and automated solutions to achieve operational efficiency and reliability.
Platforms & Environments: Windows / Linux, AWS/Azure 
Version Control / DevOps: Git, Jenkins CI/CD
Platform Engineer with strong experience designing, automating, and supporting Azure-based data and application platforms. 
Skilled in building secure, scalable cloud environments using Azure Data Factory, Azure Key Vault, Databricks, Terraform, and Ansible. 
Proven ability to automate operational workflows using PowerShell, Bash, and ensure high availability, reliability, and compliance across Windows and Red Hat Linux systems. 
Experienced in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift), cloud security protocols (OAuth, SCIM, TLS), and end-to-end CI/CD practices. 
Platform Engineer with extensive experience supporting Azure cloud services, automating infrastructure, and optimizing data and application platforms. 
Strong skills in Key Vault, Terraform, Ansible, scripting (PowerShell, Bash). 
Cloud Platform Engineer specializing in Azure automation, secure data platforms, and large-scale infrastructure reliability. 
Expert in Terraform Key Vault, and multi-OS administration. 
DevOps, IaC, and container technologies.
Senior Cloud Architect & DevSecOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience designing secure, scalable, and automated platforms across Azure and AWS.
Strong expertise in DevSecOps, integrating security into CI/CD pipelines using JFrog SonarQube,  SAST/DAST
Hands-on experience with containerization and orchestration using Docker, containers, Kubernetes
Expert in IaC and automation using Terraform, enabling consistent, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure deployments.
Proven success in enterprise CI/CD engineering, release management, and modernizing application delivery for mission-critical systems.

currentPosition.title: Founder & Principal Strategist

data.summary:
Spencer Wade, an IT graduate from Western Governorâ€™s University, is the solutions-oriented Principal Strategist at Lift Conversions, a Google Partner digital marketing agency he founded in 2014. Today, Lift Conversions has locations in both Chicago, Illinois and Westminster, Colorado with Spencer and his wife, Durene, splitting time between homes in each location.

Spencer has earned numerous certifications from the IT industryâ€™s governing bodies and holds a range of Google Alum titles for his years of work in their forums and programs. He also works with the LinkedIn Advisors team, serves as an Ambassador for WGUâ€™s Alumni and handles item writing for corporations in the digital marketing space. These roles, along with his extensive experience in marketing across verticals, have given Spencer a voice of authority in the fields heâ€™s passionate about and heâ€™s used it to assist individuals and businesses, including nonprofits, in their marketing pursuits.

Spencer and his team of Trusted Media Advisors offer a full line of world-class digital marketing services â€“ from search marketing to website design. They deliver a unique blend of boutique-style attention and powerhouse results to clients in more than 54 verticals across the US, Canada, and the EU â€“ with a referral rate over 92%!

currentPosition.description:
Inspiration for Success delivers â€˜Cognitive Catalystâ„¢ - Creative Consulting for Transformative Results.
  
This is 'thinking differently to get transformative results'  or has been defined as: 'a fast, creative strategy method that turns stuck problems into measurable momentum â€” blending imagination, evidence and execution to unlock breakthroughs.'

We use psychology and creativity, in addition to metrics, to expand possibility and the solution space. In essence, moving from a traditional, linear, left-brain approach to a more creative, oblique and right-brain approach - true cognitive diversity. This is more relevant and impactful in our current disruptive times characterised by volatility, uncertainty, complexity and ambiguity.

Put another way, creative consulting adopts behavioural science, marketing growth, product development, brand management and digital transformation principles alongside creative thinking to help solve today's and anticipated problems - especially of a second-order nature. Practical examples and deliverables include healthcare, the NHS and social mobility - as well as redefining models for finance/insurance and in other sectors (client confidentiality).

data.summary:
Dowshan Humzah, Independent Board Director & Strategic Growth Advisor

Succeed, Serve and Share is a key principle that has guided and guides Dowshan. He is a contrarian - with expertise in business transformation, digital change and innovation and creativity - as demonstrated across multiple organisations and sectors.

Professionally, Dowshan is a Board-Level Strategist and Growth Catalyst who helps organisations (across private, public and civil society sectors) scale with purpose, blending commercial innovation, digital insight, and human-centred governance.

He brings over 25 years of experience delivering creative consultancy to drive transformative results. With a focus on strategy, start-ups, and digital media, he helps organisations leverage psychology, creativity, and metrics to embrace cognitive diversity and navigate todayâ€™s volatile, uncertain and complex business environment.  

As an executive, he is renowned for multiple industry firsts - and developing, Cognitive Catalystâ„¢: Creative Consulting for transformative change (i.e. a fast, creative strategy method that turns stuck problems into measurable momentum â€” blending imagination, evidence and execution to unlock breakthrough).

As a non-Esxecutove, he is renowned for the 4 Eyes of Good Governance and Board Composition model; and Diversity of 'POETS' - providing access-to-opportunity especially for underestimated population groups and changing the narrative.

His expertise lies in combining behavioural science, marketing growth, product development, and digital transformation to expand the solution space and enable innovative thinking. Passionate about addressing uncertainty with foresight and creative approaches, he collaborates with leaders to inspire impactful change and deliver meaningful outcomes - embracing challenge and curiosity.

I'm the Founder & CEO of Mapular, a Berlin-based location intelligence SaaS startup specializing in AI-powered consumer analytics and advanced store locator solutions. I lead our team in delivering Mapular's core consumer analytics platform, which integrates online and offline dataâ€”from store locator searches, CRM, media and marketing spend (e.g., ad platforms like Google Ads or Meta), online and offline sales (e.g., e-commerce and POS systems), foot traffic, demographics, and moreâ€”creating a unified omnichannel view that helps D2C and retail brands make smarter, revenue-driving decisions. Using our proprietary AI-driven digital twin technology, we enable simulations for marketing campaigns, store performance optimization, and expansion planning, helping you reduce waste and boost ROI by connecting digital demand to in-store resultsâ€”often doubling return on ad spend.

Our store locator supports this as a powerful data engine, tracking user behavior, filters, and conversion paths to feed rich insights directly into the AI-powered analytics platform for deeper customer journey understanding and targeted growth.

With a background in geospatial tech and entrepreneurship, I co-host the GeoMob Berlin meetup to foster connections and innovation in the location intelligence community. If you're a marketing lead, growth manager, or retail expansion head at a consumer brand struggling with fragmented data or suboptimal campaigns, let's connect. I'm always open to chatting about how Mapular can transform your strategy. DM me to schedule a quick call!

My primary goal is to build a viable business plan to get investment for a display product line. I envision kitchen cabinets with AI screens adjusting the image whether it is a party or leisure time. AI Pal kiosks that invite employees back to the office. Light handheld streaming tablets for work. Safer humanoids in public with streaming control. All these are possible with low latency fiber networks of the 2030s.

CAREER

Ex-Amazon, Ex-Microsoft. Over four years of comprehensive experience. I am passionate about project financing and completion. I am a privacy advocate. I like hiking, swimming, squash, pool, writing, humor, and camping. I would be happy to move and try interesting roles in new places like NYC, Texas, The Netherlands, Germany, or France.

Note to recruiters: I am open to employment 3+ years with base & equity compensation. I am open to opportunities growing into a management/lead role to gain experience. My preference is for contract positions with established teams or limited cross-disciplinary opportunities.

data.summary:
As founder and CEO of Success Academy Charter Schools, the largest and best-performing public charter school network in New York State, I have made it my mission to challenge the conventional wisdom that children from high-need neighborhoods cannot achieve at the highest academic levels. Since I opened the first Success Academy in Harlem in 2006, I have been a leader in education reform, offering parents an alternative to chronically low-performing schools and helping thousands of children fulfill their academic potential. Today, Success Academy operates 57 schools and employs hundreds of teachers and other professionals. 

Learn more in my new memoir, The Education of Eva Moskowitz, available at Amazon now.

data.summary:
When a big startup exit turns into a hot mess, I look hard at the role of code in a tech startup. My last company broke me in a good way. I am now a fractional CTO, a low-code CTO. If you find the balance of code, tech and revenue interesting, I write a weekly newsletter on this topic [https://LowCodeCTO.com/subscribe]

I enable non-technical founders to build startups with little or no code. 

Call me when:
A. Call me/us when your vibe startup idea needs some scale.
B. Your headcount has to drop, but your velocity has to increase.
C. When your development teams are LOBBYING for a 'Full Refactor'. 
D. When technology is LIMITING revenue options.

Bring me your Vibe code gems and I will make them into production-ready revenue machines.

data.geoRegion: Florham Park, New Jersey, United States
data.summary:
Taxation is not a once a year occurrence. The tax law changes regularly, and so does your income. Since we are coming to the end of the year it is a good time to review your projected federal and state returns so you can make adjustments before year end to effect the outcome. 
At the state of New Jersey level, there were changes for homeowners and renters to receive greater rebates of rent paid or real estate taxes paid. Some affected seniors. Income levels that qualify are subject to change and the Stay NJ tax break opened up additional breaks for seniors with income up to $500,000. 
My office is Located in Florham Park, New Jersey. I have been a New Jersey Certified Public Accountant since 1974 and I am also licensed in New  York State. I have owned my own C.P.A .firm since 1983 (Website is www.cpajoe.net). I am a Certified Quickbooks Professional Advisor for both online and desktop versions. 

Specialties: Personal income tax return preparation. Corporate, partnership, LLC and other business tax return preparation.Income tax planning, business planning, business consulting, accounting, recordkeeping, projections, financial statement preparation, including  reviews and compilations.  I also work with startups to assist them in entity selection, taxation and getting their books organized.

In 2024 I started a Linkedin business page where I have posted articles on taxation and other small business  subjects. Many of the articles are collaborative efforts with linkedin based AI origination followed by professional touches by me and other professionals. For my efforts I was named a top voice in accounting until Linkedin removed those awards. If you wish to access this content, let me know and I'll provide  you a link to those to those I am connected with, and will accept connection requests from those I'm not connected to.
Regarding Linkedin, I joined here in its initial year, in January 2024 and the marketing people got to know me and I received press opportunities, most notably in the New York Times in September, 2010. The Times article is entitled "The Social Network That Gets Down to Business". When linkedin rolled out its games in 2024 I started playing Linkedin and posted an almost daily teaser on the games.With the recent changes in Linkedin's algorithm to support primarily people whose content aligns with their primary focus, I will reduce my posting about the games, but will continue to post in the pinpoint community about the games. I will continue to support players around the world and especially those in the United States, where I do business.
Serial entrepreneur.  Nerd.  Operator.  Idea guy.  Frequent loud mouth.

data.summary:
Designing with Purpose. Leading with Empathy. Driving Real Impact.

For over 18 years, Iâ€™ve dedicated my career to one simple but powerful belief:

A product alone wonâ€™t win - you must deeply understand and serve your customers to truly build something meaningful.

From telecom to e-commerce, aviation to AI, Iâ€™ve worked / partnered with global / fortune 500 brands like VISA Inc. and visionary startups to build experiences that donâ€™t just function - they connect, inspire, and convert.

What I Stand For

-> People first: Every product, every touchpoint, every design decision starts with empathy.
-> Data-driven creativity: Insights and research fuel innovation that moves metrics and hearts alike.
-> Relentless impact: I measure success by the growth, loyalty, and joy we create for customers and businesses.

My Journey

Spent nearly 12 years at Telenor Group, where I learned, executed, and led strategies around exceptional product and service design, growth hacking with a focus on retention and engagement, and end-to-end customer experience management. Since then, Iâ€™ve driven product and design strategy at Delivery Hero through data analytics, led data science and insights at AirAsia Group, and headed customer experience, human-centric design, and insights at Central Group. 

Today, I bring this wealth of experience to my role as Co-Founder of Musemind (global UX agency) and Mentor Lane (global mentorship platform).

Across 300+ clients + companies globally, my work has contributed to:

âœ… $4.5B+ in revenue impact
âœ… NPS soaring by 170%+
âœ… CSAT and CES improvements from 3 to 4.5+
âœ… Improve task completion rates from 50% to 95%.
âœ… Cutting customer complaints by half
âœ… Boosting conversion %, retention %, and lifetime value

What Drives Me

Design isnâ€™t just about aesthetics. Itâ€™s about crafting human experiences that simplify complexity, spark connection, and empower users. Whether redesigning USSD systems or offline channels or superApp / digital product & services or SaaS or e-commerce, Fintech or creating AI-powered product journeys, my focus is on usability, performance, and empathy - the perfect balance that turns users into advocates.

What Iâ€™m Excited About

Building products that unlock potential - for customers, teams, and businesses.
Innovating at the crossroads of UX, AI, and product strategy.
Driving sustainable, user-centered growth that truly matters.
And building the best mentorship platforms to help future leaders grow with clarity, confidence, and purpose.

Letâ€™s Connect >
If you believe in designing with heart and delivering measurable impact.
